FIRST_LAUNCH.TEXT_1: Welcome to the Orchid network, where the Ineternet belongs to you.
FIRST_LAUNCH.TEXT_2: Private, secure, reliable and decentralized. Connect to the entire Ineternet safely and securely from anywhere in the world. Your data belongs to you.
FIRST_LAUNCH.TEXT_3_TITLE: Share your extra bandwidth and earn orchid tokens
FIRST_LAUNCH.TEXT_3: Save, share, trade or exchange Orchid tokens (OCT) for local or digital currency.

DASHBOARD.PLEASE_ADD: Please add some OCT to connect
DASHBOARD.TOOLTIP_CONNECTION: Connect or disconnect to the Orchid Network at any time. Through the Orchid Network, you can connect to the Ineternet safely and privately.
DASHBOARD.TOOLTIP_GB_REMAINING: This an estimate of how much data (in gigabytes) you can use. This number goes up or down with the funds in your wallet and is likely to decrease faster when you’re using more data (ex. streaming video) and other network factors.
DASHBOARD.TOOLTIP_LOCATION: Orchid will route all of your web traffic through an IP address located in the country you select. For example, to browse sites accessible from the United States select “United States” from the drop-down menu.
DASHBOARD.TOOLTIP_TOTAL_EARNINGS: Track your month-to-month earnings for bandwidth sold. Your earnings may be impacted by your selling price or by limiting bandwidth usage in Settings.
DASHBOARD.TIP_LOCATION_CONTENT: Select the default location for your Ineternet connection. This is where you will appear to be connecting to the Ineternet from.
DASHBOARD.TIP_FUND_CONTENT: You will need to add some Orchid tokens (OCT) to your wallet in order to use the Orchid Network.

WALLET_SETUP.TITLE: Time to fund your wallet
WALLET_SETUP.TRANSFER_COPY: Transfer some Orchid tokens to your wallet to start using Orchid
WALLET_SETUP.WHERE: Where can I get Orchid tokens?
WALLET_SETUP.HOW: How do I transfer tokens to my wallet?

WALLET_SEND.TITLE: Send OCT
WALLET_SEND.RECIPIENT_EXPLANATION: Enter an ERC20 compatible Ethereum address below in a format that starts with 0x.

WALLET_BACKUP.TITLE: Enter a username & password
WALLET_BACKUP.EXPLANATION: This username and password will enrypt the access keys to your wallet. Please make sure to write down your password and save it in a secure location. You will not be able to recover it if you lose it.
WALLET_BACKUP.CONFIRM_EXPLANATION: Your wallet access keys are encrypted with your username and password. Make sure to write down your password and store it in a secure location. If lost, it can't be recovered.

SETTINGS.TOOLTIP_LAUNCH_STARTUP: Turn this on if you want the Orchid app to launch when you start your computer. This will not connect your device to Orchid, but will open the app so you can more easily connect when you’re ready.
SETTINGS.TOOLTIP_CONNECT_ON_STARTUP: Turn this on to launch and connect to the Orchid network automatically whenever you turn on your computer/phone.
SETTINGS.TOOLTIP_EXIT_NODE: Allow others to use your computer or device as a Relay and you’ll earn tokens for participating in the network. As a Relay, your IP address will always remain private. While a Seller’s IP address may be tracked by websites visited by Orchid users, a Relay’s IP address is never exposed and is simply used to pass on the user's request to an available Seller. Being as a Relay could impact your Internet connection speed, especially when streaming media.
SETTINGS.TOOLTIP_LIMIT_BANDWIDTH: If your Internet Service Provider (ISP) limits your bandwidth and you’re concerned about being charged fees for exceeding data limits, you may want to turn this on and set a monthly GB limit for Orchid.
SETTINGS.TOOLTIP_RELAY_NODE: Allow others to use your computer or device as a Relay and you’ll earn tokens for participating in the network. As a Relay, your IP address will always remain private. While a Seller’s IP address may be tracked by websites visited by Orchid users, a Relay’s IP address is never exposed and is simply used to pass on the user's request to an available Seller. Being as a Relay could impact your Internet connection speed, especially when streaming media.
SETTINGS.TOOLTIP_ALL_CONNECTIONS: If this is selected, any program running on your computer that connects to the Internet will access the Internet through the Orchid Network.
SETTINGS.TOOLTIP_BROWSERS_ONLY: In some cases you may wish to only connect through the Orchid Network using your Internet browser. For instance if you use a VPN, mail client or FTP program that requires you to connect from your local IP address. If you enable this setting these types of connections will not run through the Orchid network.
SETTINGS.TOOLTIP_AUTO_TRANSFER: If you prefer not to manually move OCT funds to your external wallet, Orchid gives you the option to set up automatic forwarding using auto-transfer. You can easily add, unlink, delete, and change settings for your external wallet using this feature.
SETTINGS.TOOLTIP_PRICE_GB_SHARED: Your price per gigabyte when selling bandwidth. Orchid automatically sets your price to the current market rate for Sellers. You can also opt to set your own price, higher or lower.
SETTINGS.TOOLTIP_PRICE_GB_USED: Your price per gigabyte when buying bandwidth. Orchid automatically sets your price to the going market rate for Buyers. You can also opt to set your own price, higher or lower.
